verses.verse: The word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> that came <WH1961> to Jeremiah <WH3414> the prophet <WH5030> against <WH413> the Philistines, <WH6430> before <WH2962> that Pharaoh <WH6547> smote <WH5221> Gaza. <WH5804>

Thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the LORD; <WH3068> Behold, <WH2009> waters <WH4325> rise <WH5927> up out of the north, <WH6828> and shall be an overflowing <WH7857> flood, <WH5158> and shall overflow <WH7857> the land, <WH776> and all <WH4393> that is therein; <WH4393> the city, <WH5892> and them that dwell <WH3427> therein: then the men <WH120> shall cry, <WH2199> and all <WH3605> the inhabitants <WH3427> of the land <WH776> shall howl. <WH3213>

At the noise <WH6963> of the stamping <WH8161> of the hoofs <WH6541> of his strong <WH47> horses, <WH5483> at the rushing <WH7494> of his chariots, <WH7393> and at the rumbling <WH1995> of his wheels, <WH1534> the fathers <WH1> shall not look <WH6437> back <WH3437> to their children <WH1121> for feebleness <WH7510> of hands; <WH3027>

Because <WH5921> of the day <WH3117> that comes <WH935> to spoil <WH7703> all <WH3605> the Philistines, <WH6430> and to cut <WH3772> off from Tyrus <WH6865> and Zidon <WH6721> every <WH3605> helper <WH5826> that remains: <WH8300> for the LORD <WH3068> will spoil <WH7703> the Philistines, <WH6430> the remnant <WH7611> of the country <WH339> of Caphtor. <WH3731>
Baldness <WH7144> is come <WH935> on Gaza; <WH5804> Ashkelon <WH831> is cut <WH1820> off with the remnant <WH7611> of their valley: <WH6010> how <WH5704> long <WH5704> will you cut <WH1413> yourself?

O you sword <WH2719> of the LORD, <WH3068> how <WH5704> long <WH5704> will it be ere <WH3808> you be quiet? <WH8252> put <WH622> up yourself into <WH413> your scabbard, <WH8593> rest, <WH7280> and be still. <WH1826>

How <WH349> can it be quiet, <WH8252> seeing the LORD <WH3068> has given it a charge <WH6680> against <WH413> Ashkelon, <WH831> and against <WH413> the sea <WH3220> shore? <WH2348> there <WH8033> has he appointed <WH3259> it.
